Made from bagasse - the natural fibre left after sugarcane processing - these lids are 100% plant-based and commercially compostable. The sip-through opening provides easy drinking access while the secure rim fit prevents spills during transport. Available for 8oz cups (80mm rim) and 12oz cups (90mm rim). Ideal for zero-waste cafes, eco-conscious coffee shops, and businesses where sustainability credentials matter. Pair with our compostable paper cups for a fully plastic-free hot drinks service.Complete your takeaway coffee service with our range of sip lids, designed to fit securely on standard paper hot cups. Bagasse lids offer a fully compostable solution made from sugarcane fibre, breaking down in commercial composting facilities alongside food waste. Their natural colour and plant-based credentials appeal to environmentally conscious customers. rPET lids provide a lightweight, recyclable option with excellent clarity and a satisfying snap-fit closure. Available in black for a premium café aesthetic or white for a clean, classic look, these lids are made from recycled plastic and can be recycled again after use. Both lid types feature a raised sip opening that helps prevent spills while allowing comfortable drinking on the go. The secure rim fit keeps drinks hot and reduces leakage during transport. Compatible with our Coffee Cups range and most standard takeaway cups. Available in cases to match your cup quantities.
